trans-unit.source: A container timeline that provides object and property targeting information for its child animations.
trans-unit.target: Una sequenza temporale contenitore che fornisce oggetti e proprietà informazioni di destinazione per le animazioni figlio.

trans-unit.source: ## Interactively Controlling Storyboards A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed.
trans-unit.target: ##In modo interattivo storyboard controllo uno storyboard controllabile può sospendere, riprendere, ricerca, arrestare e rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in markup, you specify the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> object that creates it; for an example, see [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per rendere uno storyboard controllabile nel markup, specificare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>l'oggetto che lo crea; per un esempio, vedere [procedura: utilizzare i trigger di evento per controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: Per rendere uno storyboard controllabile nel codice, è necessario utilizzare l'overload appropriato dello storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>(metodo) e specificare `true` per renderlo controllabile.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio, vedere [procedura: controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Data Binding and Animating Timelines Most timeline properties can be data bound or animated; however, because of the way the timing system works, data bound or animated timelines do not behave like other data bound or animated objects.
trans-unit.target: Data Binding e animazione sequenze temporali più proprietà della sequenza temporale può essere associata a dati o animata; Tuttavia, a causa della modalità di funzionamento del sistema di temporizzazione, dati associate o animate sequenze temporali non si comportano come gli altri dati associato o animati oggetti.

trans-unit.source: To understand their behavior, it helps to understand what it means to activate a timeline.
trans-unit.target: Per comprendere questo comportamento, è utile per comprendere le implicazioni attivare una sequenza temporale.

trans-unit.source: When a timeline is activated, copies are made of the timeline and its child timelines.
trans-unit.target: Quando una sequenza temporale è attivata, vengono effettuate copie della sequenza temporale e le sequenze temporali figlio.

trans-unit.source: These copies are frozen (made read-only) and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created from them.
trans-unit.target: Queste copie sono bloccate (resa di sola lettura) e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>vengono creati oggetti da essi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks do the actual work of animating the targeted properties.
trans-unit.target: Questi orologi di eseguono il lavoro effettivo dell'animazione le proprietà di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: If a timeline is data bound or animated, a snapshot of its current values is made when its clock is created.
trans-unit.target: Se una sequenza temporale è associata a dati o aggiungendo un'animazione, uno snapshot dei relativi valori correnti viene eseguito quando viene creato il clock.

trans-unit.source: Even though the original timeline might continue to change, its clock does not.
trans-unit.target: Anche se la sequenza temporale originale potrebbe continuare a modificare, ovvero il clock non lo consente.

trans-unit.source: For a timeline to reflect data binding or animation changes, its clock must be re-created.
trans-unit.target: Per una sequenza temporale per riflettere le modifiche di animazione o di associazione di dati, ovvero il clock deve essere ricreato.

trans-unit.source: Clocks are not re-created for you automatically.
trans-unit.target: Clock non vengono nuovamente creati per l'utente automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The following are several ways to apply timeline changes: - If the timeline is or belongs to a Storyboard, you can make it reflect changes by reapplying its storyboard using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Di seguito sono diversi modi per applicare le modifiche della sequenza temporale:-se la sequenza temporale è o appartiene a uno Storyboard, è possibile far sì che rifletta le modifiche riapplicando dello storyboard, utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: This has the side effect of also restarting the animation.
trans-unit.target: Questo ha l'effetto collaterale di riavvio dell'animazione.

trans-unit.source: In code, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A> method to advance the storyboard back to its previous position.
trans-unit.target: Nel codice, è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A>nuovamente metodo per spostare lo storyboard in posizione precedente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If you applied an animation directly to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> method, call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> method again and pass it the animation that has been modified.
trans-unit.target: -Se è applicata un'animazione direttamente a una proprietà utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>metodo, chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>nuovo metodo e passare l'animazione che è stato modificato.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If you are working directly at the clock level, create and apply a new set of clocks and use them to replace the previous set of created clocks.
trans-unit.target: -Se si lavora direttamente a livello di orologio, creare e applicare un nuovo insieme di clock e utilizzarli per sostituire il set precedente di orologi creati.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a data bound animation, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011) .
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio di un tipo di dati animazione associata, vedere [chiave Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011) .

trans-unit.target: Gli storyboard avviati con questo metodo non possono essere sospesa, riprendere o controllati in modo interattivo dopo l'avvio.

trans-unit.source: To interactively control this storyboard, you must specify the same `containingObject` when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: Per controllare in modo interattivo questo storyboard, è necessario specificare lo stesso `containingObject` quando si chiama i metodi interattivi che consentono di avviare lo storyboard quando questo metodo viene chiamato, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>oggetti vengono creati storyboard e le sequenze in essa contenute.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Questi orologi vengono archiviati con `containingObject`.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se lo storyboard deve essere controllabile interattivamente; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets and initiates them, using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Applica le animazioni associate a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> alle destinazioni e le avvia, utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: Quando si applica un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>a una proprietà utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>gli oggetti precedentemente associati a tale proprietà continueranno a utilizzare le risorse di sistema, il sistema di temporizzazione non rimuove automaticamente questi orologi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Per evitare problemi di prestazioni quando si applica un numero elevato di clock utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, è necessario rimuovere clock di composizione dalla proprietà animata dopo il completamento.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock.
trans-unit.target: Esistono diversi modi per rimuovere un orologio.

trans-unit.source: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: -Per rimuovere tutti gli orologi da una proprietà, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>metodo dell'oggetto animato.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Specificare la proprietà viene aggiunta un'animazione come primo parametro, e `null` come il secondo.

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Questo rimuove tutti gli orologi di animazione della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -Per rimuovere un specifico <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>da un elenco di clock, utilizzare la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>proprietà di una di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>recuperare un oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>quindi chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>metodo di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Ciò avviene in genere il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>gestore eventi per un orologio.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che solo i clock radice possono essere controllati da un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>restituisce proprietà di un orologio figlio `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Si noti inoltre che il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>evento non viene chiamato se la durata effettiva dell'orologio è infinita.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: In tal caso, l'utente deve determinare quando chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Si tratta principalmente di un problema per le animazioni su oggetti che hanno una lunga durata.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Quando un oggetto viene sottoposto a garbage collection, anche i clock vengono disconnessi e raccolti nel Garbage Collector.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sugli oggetti clock, vedere [animazione e temporizzazione System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se lo storyboard deve essere controllabile interattivamente; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets within the specified template and initiates them.
trans-unit.target: Applica le animazioni associate a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> alle destinazioni all'interno del modello specificato e le avvia.

trans-unit.source: If the targeted properties are already animated, they are replaced using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> handoff behavior.
trans-unit.target: Se le proprietà di destinazione sono già animate, vengono sostituiti con il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>HandoffBehavior.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: Quando questo metodo viene chiamato, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>oggetti vengono creati storyboard e le sequenze in essa contenute.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Questi orologi vengono archiviati con `containingObject`.

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: A partire da uno storyboard di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>eventi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: The object to which the specified `frameworkTemplate` has been applied.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto a cui l'oggetto specificato `frameworkTemplate` è stato applicato.

trans-unit.source: Animations without a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*> are applied to `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Le animazioni senza un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>vengono applicate a `containingObject`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>

trans-unit.source: The template to animate.
trans-unit.target: Modello da cui iniziare l'animazione.

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets and initiates them, using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Applica le animazioni associate a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> alle destinazioni e le avvia, utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An object contained within the same name scope as the targets of this storyboard's animations.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto contenuto nello stesso ambito nome come destinazioni delle animazioni di questo storyboard.

trans-unit.source: Animations without a specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*> are applied to `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Le animazioni senza un oggetto specificato <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>vengono applicate a `containingObject`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>

trans-unit.source: The behavior the new animation should use to interact with any current animations.
trans-unit.target: Il comportamento della nuova animazione deve utilizzare per interagire con tutte le animazioni correnti.

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets and initiates them, using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Applica le animazioni associate a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> alle destinazioni e le avvia, utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the targeted properties are already animated, they are replaced using the specified handoff behavior.
trans-unit.target: Se le proprietà di destinazione sono già animate, vengono sostituiti con il comportamento uniforme specificato.

trans-unit.source: To interactively control this storyboard, you must specify the same `containingObject` when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: Per controllare in modo interattivo questo storyboard, è necessario specificare lo stesso `containingObject` quando si chiama i metodi interattivi che consentono di avviare lo storyboard quando questo metodo viene chiamato, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>oggetti vengono creati storyboard e le sequenze in essa contenute.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Questi orologi vengono archiviati con `containingObject`.

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: A partire da uno storyboard di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>eventi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzo di HandoffBehavior comporre quando si applica un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>a una proprietà utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>gli oggetti precedentemente associati a tale proprietà continueranno a utilizzare le risorse di sistema, il sistema di temporizzazione non rimuove automaticamente questi orologi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Per evitare problemi di prestazioni quando si applica un numero elevato di clock utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, è necessario rimuovere clock di composizione dalla proprietà animata dopo il completamento.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock.
trans-unit.target: Esistono diversi modi per rimuovere un orologio.

trans-unit.source: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: -Per rimuovere tutti gli orologi da una proprietà, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>metodo dell'oggetto animato.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Specificare la proprietà viene aggiunta un'animazione come primo parametro, e `null` come il secondo.

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Questo rimuove tutti gli orologi di animazione della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -Per rimuovere un specifico <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>da un elenco di clock, utilizzare la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>proprietà di una di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>recuperare un oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>quindi chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>metodo di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Ciò avviene in genere il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>gestore eventi per un orologio.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che solo i clock radice possono essere controllati da un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>restituisce proprietà di un orologio figlio `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Si noti inoltre che il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>evento non viene chiamato se la durata effettiva dell'orologio è infinita.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: In tal caso, l'utente deve determinare quando chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Si tratta principalmente di un problema per le animazioni su oggetti che hanno una lunga durata.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Quando un oggetto viene sottoposto a garbage collection, anche i clock vengono disconnessi e raccolti nel Garbage Collector.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sugli oggetti clock, vedere [animazione e temporizzazione System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: A partire da uno storyboard di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>eventi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzo di HandoffBehavior comporre quando si applica un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>a una proprietà utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>gli oggetti precedentemente associati a tale proprietà continueranno a utilizzare le risorse di sistema, il sistema di temporizzazione non rimuove automaticamente questi orologi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Per evitare problemi di prestazioni quando si applica un numero elevato di clock utilizzando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, è necessario rimuovere clock di composizione dalla proprietà animata dopo il completamento.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock.
trans-unit.target: Esistono diversi modi per rimuovere un orologio.

trans-unit.source: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: -Per rimuovere tutti gli orologi da una proprietà, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>metodo dell'oggetto animato.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Specificare la proprietà viene aggiunta un'animazione come primo parametro, e `null` come il secondo.

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Questo rimuove tutti gli orologi di animazione della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -Per rimuovere un specifico <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>da un elenco di clock, utilizzare la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>proprietà di una di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>recuperare un oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>quindi chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>metodo di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Ciò avviene in genere il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>gestore eventi per un orologio.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che solo i clock radice possono essere controllati da un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>restituisce proprietà di un orologio figlio `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Si noti inoltre che il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>evento non viene chiamato se la durata effettiva dell'orologio è infinita.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: In tal caso, l'utente deve determinare quando chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Si tratta principalmente di un problema per le animazioni su oggetti che hanno una lunga durata.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Quando un oggetto viene sottoposto a garbage collection, anche i clock vengono disconnessi e raccolti nel Garbage Collector.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sugli oggetti clock, vedere [animazione e temporizzazione System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An object contained within the same name scope as the targets of this storyboard's animations.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto contenuto nello stesso ambito nome come destinazioni delle animazioni di questo storyboard.

trans-unit.source: Animations without a specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*> are applied to `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Le animazioni senza un oggetto specificato <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>vengono applicate a `containingObject`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>

trans-unit.source: The behavior the new animation should use to interact with any current animations.
trans-unit.target: Il comportamento della nuova animazione deve utilizzare per interagire con tutte le animazioni correnti.

trans-unit.source: Declares whether the animation is controllable (can be paused) once started.
trans-unit.target: Dichiara se l'animazione è controllabile (può essere sospesa) una volta avviato.

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets within the specified template and initiates them.
trans-unit.target: Applica le animazioni associate a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> alle destinazioni all'interno del modello specificato e le avvia.

trans-unit.source: To interactively control this storyboard, you must specify the same `containingObject` when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: Per controllare in modo interattivo questo storyboard, è necessario specificare lo stesso `containingObject` quando si chiama i metodi interattivi che consentono di avviare lo storyboard quando questo metodo viene chiamato, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>oggetti vengono creati storyboard e le sequenze in essa contenute.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the storyboard should be interactively controllable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se lo storyboard deve essere controllabile interattivamente; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>, eseguendo copie complete dei valori dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Durante la copia delle proprietà di dipendenza, questo metodo copia delle associazioni dati e dei riferimenti di risorsa (), ma non possono risolvere non le animazioni né i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Un clone modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto clonato <> </> *> proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> anche se l'origine <> </> *> è di proprietà<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This method is called internally by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstance%2A> when creating new instances of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> class for the various cloning methods (such as <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato internamente da <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstance%2A>durante la creazione di nuove istanze del <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>classe per i vari metodi di duplicazione (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Un nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> that was created for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Recupera il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>del <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> che è stato creato per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>

trans-unit.source: The current global speed, or 0 if the clock is stopped.
trans-unit.target: La velocità globale corrente, oppure 0 se l'orologio viene arrestato.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> that was created for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Recupera il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>del <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> che è stato creato per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>

trans-unit.source: A clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A> speed is the rate at which its time is currently progressing, compared to real-world time.
trans-unit.target: Un clock <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>velocità è la frequenza con cui è attualmente progressione del tempo, rispetto al tempo del mondo reale.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>

trans-unit.source: To use this method to retrieve information about a storyboard's clock, the storyboard must be controllable.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare questo metodo per recuperare informazioni su un orologio storyboard, lo storyboard deve essere controllabile.

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: Per rendere uno storyboard controllabile nel codice, è necessario utilizzare l'overload appropriato dello storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>(metodo) e specificare `true` per renderlo controllabile.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio, vedere [procedura: controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The object specified when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%28System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method was called.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto specificato al momento il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%28System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement%2CSystem.Boolean%29> metodo è stato chiamato.

trans-unit.target: Questo oggetto contiene i <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> gli oggetti creati per questo storyboard e i relativi elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: The current global speed, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the clock is stopped.

trans-unit.target: Recupera il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>del <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> che è stato creato per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>

trans-unit.source: To use this method to retrieve information about a storyboard's clock, the storyboard must be controllable.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare questo metodo per recuperare informazioni su un orologio storyboard, lo storyboard deve essere controllabile.

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: Per rendere uno storyboard controllabile nel codice, è necessario utilizzare l'overload appropriato dello storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>(metodo) e specificare `true` per renderlo controllabile.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio, vedere [procedura: controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The object specified when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%28System.Windows.FrameworkElement%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method was called.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto specificato al momento il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%28System.Windows.FrameworkElement%2CSystem.Boolean%29> metodo è stato chiamato.

trans-unit.source: This object contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> objects that were created for this storyboard and its children.
trans-unit.target: Questo oggetto contiene i <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> gli oggetti creati per questo storyboard e i relativi elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: The current global speed, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the clock is stopped.
trans-unit.target: La velocità globale corrente, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se l'orologio viene arrestato.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentIteration*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> that was created for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Recupera il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentIteration*>del <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> che è stato creato per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentIteration*>

trans-unit.source: A clock's first iteration has a value of 1.
trans-unit.target: Prima iterazione di un orologio ha un valore pari a 1.

trans-unit.source: If this storyboard has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A> setting of `true`, a full iteration consists of a forward-reverse pair, not just one of these segments.
trans-unit.target: Se questo storyboard ha un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>impostazione `true`, un'iterazione completa è costituita da una coppia bidirezionale e non solo uno di questi segmenti.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>

trans-unit.source: A clock's first iteration has a value of 1.
trans-unit.target: Prima iterazione di un orologio ha un valore pari a 1.

trans-unit.source: If this clock's timeline has an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A> setting of `true`, a full iteration consists of a forward-reverse pair, not just one of these segments.
trans-unit.target: Se temporale questa sequenza ha un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>impostazione `true`, un'iterazione completa è costituita da una coppia bidirezionale e non solo uno di questi segmenti.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of its current iteration, seeking a clock returns its current iteration to 1.
trans-unit.target: Indipendentemente dall'iterazione corrente, la ricerca di un orologio restituisce l'iterazione corrente a 1.

trans-unit.source: Restarting a clock also returns its current iteration to 1.
trans-unit.target: Il riavvio di un orologio restituisce inoltre l'iterazione corrente a 1.
